document.full_text: china is willing to increase agricultural imports from japan, provided they meet safety standards, chinese premier wen jiabao said on saturday while visiting the japanese region battered by an earthquake, tsunami and nuclear accident in march.
document.title: china's wen signals easing of japan imports ban
lines_and_colors: china is willing to increase agricultural imports from japan, provided they meet safety standards, chinese premier wen jiabao said on saturday while visiting the japanese region battered by an earthquake, tsunami and nuclear accident in march.
